Some very strange things are happening in Chinaï¼ They are becoming very hostileï¼Œ and sending letters to Countries throughout the Worldï¼Œ that they want to impose Export Controls on each and every element of production having to do with Rare Earthsï¼Œ and virtually anything else they can think ofï¼Œ even if itâ€™s not manufactured in China. Nobody has ever seen anything like this butï¼Œ essentiallyï¼Œ it would â€œclogâ€ the Marketsï¼Œ and make life difficult for virtually every Country in the Worldï¼Œ especially for China. We have been contacted by other Countries who are extremely angry at this great Trade hostilityï¼Œ which came out of nowhere. Our relationship with China over the past six months has been a very good oneï¼Œ thereby making this move on Trade an even more surprising one. I have always felt that theyâ€™ve been lying in waitï¼Œ and nowï¼Œ as usualï¼Œ I have been proven rightï¼ There is no way that China should be allowed to hold the World â€œcaptiveï¼Œâ€ but that seems to have been their plan for quite some timeï¼Œ starting with the â€œMagnetsâ€ andï¼Œ other Elements that they have quietly amassed into somewhat of a Monopoly positionï¼Œ a rather sinister and hostile moveï¼Œ to say the least. But the U.S. has Monopoly positions alsoï¼Œ much stronger and more far reaching than Chinaâ€™s. I have just not chosen to use themï¼Œ there was never a reason for me to do so â€” UNTIL NOWï¼ The letter they sent is many pages longï¼Œ and detailsï¼Œ with great specificityï¼Œ each and every Element that they want to withhold from other Nations. Things that were routine are no longer routine at all. I have not spoken to President Xi because there was no reason to do so. This was a real surpriseï¼Œ not only to meï¼Œ but to all the Leaders of the Free World. I was to meet President Xi in two weeksï¼Œ at APECï¼Œ in South Koreaï¼Œ but now there seems to be no reason to do so. The Chinese letters were especially inappropriate in that this was the Day thatï¼Œ after three thousand years of bedlam and fightingï¼Œ there is PEACE IN THE MIDDLE EAST. I wonder if that timing was coincidentalï¼Ÿ Dependent on what China says about the hostile â€œorderâ€ that they have just put outï¼Œ I will be forcedï¼Œ as President of the United States of Americaï¼Œ to financially counter their move. For every Element that they have been able to monopolizeï¼Œ we have two. I never thought it would come to this but perhapsï¼Œ as with all thingsï¼Œ the time has come. Ultimatelyï¼Œ though potentially painfulï¼Œ it will be a very good thingï¼Œ in the endï¼Œ for the U.S.A. One of the Policies that we are calculating at this moment is a massive increase of Tariffs on Chinese products coming into the United States of America. There are many other countermeasures that areï¼Œ likewiseï¼Œ under serious consideration. Thank you for your attention to this matterï¼
